Package staff.unipr.it

Class HomeStaffController

java.lang.Object
staff.unipr.it.HomeStaffController
public class HomeStaffController extends Object
The HomeStaffController class is used to show to a Staff member a menuBar where he can choose what he wants to do
Author:
Spagni Alex Zuelli Arianna
